hooks.command: file_path=$(echo '$1' | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // ""'); if [ -n "$file_path" ]; then allowed_patterns="^(src/|tests/|README\.md|pyproject\.toml|CHANGELOG\.md|\.claude/|docs/)"; if ! echo "$file_path" | grep -qE "$allowed_patterns"; then echo 'INFO: R&D Framework reminder - Stay focused on core project files during context priming. File: '$file_path >&2; fi; fi

file_path=$(echo '$1' | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // ""'); if [ -n "$file_path" ] && [ -f "$file_path" ]; then size_kb=$(du -k "$file_path" | cut -f1); if [ $size_kb -gt 256 ]; then echo 'WARNING: Large file detected ('$size_kb'KB). Extract only necessary sections to follow R&D Framework context discipline.' >&2; fi; fi
echo 'INFO: Consider delegating web scraping to doc-scraper agent to keep main context clean.' >&2
